main event: A resident in Wiggins, Mississippi reported observing a circular unidentified flying object that emitted a bright, pulsating light.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 30-40 feet in diameter,The object hovered silently for several minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing,The observer provided a rough sketch of the object,The sighting was reported as part of the investigation by the United States Air Force under Project Blue Book,The investigation concluded that there was no corroborating evidence or additional witnesses.
witness description: Mr. James H. Wiggins, a resident of Wiggins, Mississippi.
